file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    email: translator@broadinstitute.org
  termsOfService: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/about/terms-of-use/
  title: Transformer API for ChEMBL
  version: 2.4.0
servers:
- url: https://translator.broadinstitute.org/chembl
tags:
- name: transformers
paths:
  /{service}/transform:
    post:
      description: Depending on the function of a transformer, creates, expands, or
        filters a list.
      operationId: service_transform_post
      parameters:
      - description: Service provided by this transformer.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          enum:
          - molecules
          - activities
          - targets
          - indications
          - treatments
          - mechanisms
          - activities
          - metabolites
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Directive for handling caching, can be 'yes' (default), 'no',
          'bypass' or 'remove'
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: cache
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/transformer_query'
        description: transformer query
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/element'
                type: array
          description: successful operation
        400:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/error_msg'
          description: bad request
        404:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/error_msg'
          description: not found
        500:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/error_msg'
          description: internal server error
      summary: Transform a list of genes or compounds
      tags:
      - transformers
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.transformers_controller
  /{service}/transformer_info:
    get:
      description: Provides information about the transformer.
      operationId: service_transformer_info_get
      parameters:
      - description: Service provided by this transformer.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: service
        required: true
        schema:
          enum:
          - molecules
          - activities
          - targets
          - indications
          - treatments
          - mechanisms
          - activities
          - metabolites
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Directive for handling caching, can be 'yes' (default), 'no',
          'bypass' or 'remove'
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: cache
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/transformer_info'
          description: successful operation
      summary: Retrieve transformer info
      tags:
      - transformers
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.transformers_controller
components:
  schemas:
    transformer_info:
      description: Definition of the transformer.
      example:
        knowledge_map:
          predicates:
          - predicate: predicate
            inverse_relations:
            - inverse_relations
            - inverse_relations
            subject: subject
            count: 6
            attributes:
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            source: ChEMBL
            relations:
            - binds_to
            inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
            object: object
          - predicate: predicate
            inverse_relations:
            - inverse_relations
            - inverse_relations
            subject: subject
            count: 6
            attributes:
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            source: ChEMBL
            relations:
            - binds_to
            inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
            object: object
          nodes:
            key:
              id_prefixes:
              - 'ChEMBL:'
              - 'inchikey:'
              count: 0
              attributes:
              - names:
                - PubMed Identifier
                attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
                source: UniProtKB
                type: EDAM:data_1187
              - names:
                - PubMed Identifier
                attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
                source: UniProtKB
                type: EDAM:data_1187
          output_class: output_class
          edges:
          - predicate: predicate
            inverse_relations:
            - inverse_relations
            - inverse_relations
            subject: subject
            count: 6
            attributes:
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            source: ChEMBL
            relations:
            - binds_to
            inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
            object: object
          - predicate: predicate
            inverse_relations:
            - inverse_relations
            - inverse_relations
            subject: subject
            count: 6
            attributes:
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            source: ChEMBL
            relations:
            - binds_to
            inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
            object: object
          input_class: input_class
        function: producer
        name: name
        description: description
        label: label
        version: version
        parameters:
        - allowed_values:
          - allowed_values
          - allowed_values
          default: default
          allowed_range:
          - 1.4658129805029452
          - 1.4658129805029452
          multivalued: true
          name: name
          suggested_values: suggested_values
          type: Boolean
          required: true
          example: example
        - allowed_values:
          - allowed_values
          - allowed_values
          default: default
          allowed_range:
          - 1.4658129805029452
          - 1.4658129805029452
          multivalued: true
          name: name
          suggested_values: suggested_values
          type: Boolean
          required: true
          example: example
        properties:
          source_version: source_version
          method: method
          terms_of_service: terms_of_service
          method_url: method_url
          source_url: source_url
      properties:
        name:
          description: Name of the transformer.
          type: string
        label:
          description: Short label for GUI display.
          type: string
        description:
          description: Description of the transformer.
          type: string
        version:
          description: Transformer's version.
          type: string
        function:
          description: Function of the transformer, one of 'producer', 'expander',
            'filter', 'transformer', 'exporter', or 'aggregator'.
          enum:
          - producer
          - expander
          - filter
          - transformer
          - exporter
          - aggregator
          type: string
        knowledge_map:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/knowledge_map'
        properties:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/transformer_info_properties'
        parameters:
          description: Parameters used to control the transformer.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/parameter'
          type: array
      required:
      - function
      - knowledge_map
      - label
      - name
      - version
      type: object
    parameter:
      example:
        allowed_values:
        - allowed_values
        - allowed_values
        default: default
        allowed_range:
        - 1.4658129805029452
        - 1.4658129805029452
        multivalued: true
        name: name
        suggested_values: suggested_values
        type: Boolean
        required: true
        example: example
      properties:
        name:
          description: Name of the parameter.
          type: string
        type:
          description: Type of the parameter, one of 'Boolean', 'int', 'double', 'string'.
          enum:
          - Boolean
          - int
          - double
          - string
          type: string
        required:
          description: Indicates whether the parameter is required(default true).
          type: boolean
        multivalued:
          description: Indicates whether multiple occurences of the parameter are
            allowed (default false).
          type: boolean
        default:
          description: Default value of the parameter.
          type: string
        example:
          description: Example value of the parameter.
          type: string
        allowed_values:
          description: Allowed values for the parameter.
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        allowed_range:
          description: Allowed range for values of the parameter.
          items:
            type: number
          maxItems: 2
          minItems: 2
          type: array
        suggested_values:
          description: Suggested value range for the parameter.
          type: string
      required:
      - name
      - type
      type: object
    knowledge_map:
      description: Knowledge-graph representation of the transformer.
      example:
        predicates:
        - predicate: predicate
          inverse_relations:
          - inverse_relations
          - inverse_relations
          subject: subject
          count: 6
          attributes:
          - names:
            - PubMed Identifier
            attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            source: UniProtKB
            type: EDAM:data_1187
          - names:
            - PubMed Identifier
            attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            source: UniProtKB
            type: EDAM:data_1187
          source: ChEMBL
          relations:
          - binds_to
          inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
          object: object
        - predicate: predicate
          inverse_relations:
          - inverse_relations
          - inverse_relations
          subject: subject
          count: 6
          attributes:
          - names:
            - PubMed Identifier
            attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            source: UniProtKB
            type: EDAM:data_1187
          - names:
            - PubMed Identifier
            attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            source: UniProtKB
            type: EDAM:data_1187
          source: ChEMBL
          relations:
          - binds_to
          inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
          object: object
        nodes:
          key:
            id_prefixes:
            - 'ChEMBL:'
            - 'inchikey:'
            count: 0
            attributes:
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
            - names:
              - PubMed Identifier
              attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
              source: UniProtKB
              type: EDAM:data_1187
        output_class: output_class
        edges:
        - predicate: predicate
          inverse_relations:
          - inverse_relations
          - inverse_relations
          subject: subject
          count: 6
          attributes:
          - names:
            - PubMed Identifier
            attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            source: UniProtKB
            type: EDAM:data_1187
          - names:
            - PubMed Identifier
            attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            source: UniProtKB
            type: EDAM:data_1187
          source: ChEMBL
          relations:
          - binds_to
          inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
          object: object
        - predicate: predicate
          inverse_relations:
          - inverse_relations
          - inverse_relations
          subject: subject
          count: 6
          attributes:
          - names:
            - PubMed Identifier
            attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            source: UniProtKB
            type: EDAM:data_1187
          - names:
            - PubMed Identifier
            attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            source: UniProtKB
            type: EDAM:data_1187
          source: ChEMBL
          relations:
          - binds_to
          inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
          object: object
        input_class: input_class
      properties:
        input_class:
          description: BioLink class for the members of the input list.
          type: string
        output_class:
          description: BioLink class for the members of the output list.
          type: string
        nodes:
          additionalProperties:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/node'
          description: List of semantic types in the KnowledgeMap.
          type: object
        edges:
          description: Predicates describing relationships between subjects and objects.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/predicate'
          type: array
        predicates:
          deprecated: true
          description: Predicates describing relationships between subjects and objects.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/predicate'
          type: array
      required:
      - input_class
      - output_class
      type: object
    node:
      additionalProperties: false
      description: Description of semantic types provided by this knowledge source.
      example:
        id_prefixes:
        - 'ChEMBL:'
        - 'inchikey:'
        count: 0
        attributes:
        - names:
          - PubMed Identifier
          attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
          source: UniProtKB
          type: EDAM:data_1187
        - names:
          - PubMed Identifier
          attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
          source: UniProtKB
          type: EDAM:data_1187
      properties:
        id_prefixes:
          description: List of CURIE prefixes that this knowledge source understands
            and accepts on the input.
          example:
          - 'ChEMBL:'
          - 'inchikey:'
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        count:
          description: Number of node instances known to this knowledge source
          type: integer
        attributes:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/km_attribute'
          type: array
      required:
      - id_prefixes
      type: object
    predicate:
      additionalProperties: false
      description: Predicate describing relationship between a subject and an object.
      example:
        predicate: predicate
        inverse_relations:
        - inverse_relations
        - inverse_relations
        subject: subject
        count: 6
        attributes:
        - names:
          - PubMed Identifier
          attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
          source: UniProtKB
          type: EDAM:data_1187
        - names:
          - PubMed Identifier
          attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
          source: UniProtKB
          type: EDAM:data_1187
        source: ChEMBL
        relations:
        - binds_to
        inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
        object: object
      properties:
        subject:
          type: string
        predicate:
          type: string
        inverse_predicate:
          type: string
        object:
          type: string
        source:
          description: Source of the relationship.
          example: ChEMBL
          type: string
        relations:
          description: Low-level relations from the underlying source.
          example:
          - binds_to
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        inverse_relations:
          description: Inverse low-level relations from the underlying source.
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        count:
          description: Number of edge instances known to this knowledge source
          type: integer
        attributes:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/km_attribute'
          type: array
      required:
      - inverse_predicate
      - object
      - predicate
      - subject
      type: object
    km_attribute:
      additionalProperties: false
      description: Description of attribute types provided by this knowledge source.
      example:
        names:
        - PubMed Identifier
        attribute_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
        source: UniProtKB
        type: EDAM:data_1187
      properties:
        type:
          deprecated: true
          description: CURIE of the semantic type of the attribute, from the EDAM
            ontology if possible. If a suitable identifier does not exist, enter a
            descriptive phrase here and submit the new type for consideration by the
            appropriate authority.
          example: EDAM:data_1187
          type: string
        attribute_type_id:
          description: CURIE of the semantic type of the attribute, from the EDAM
            ontology if possible. If a suitable identifier does not exist, enter a
            descriptive phrase here and submit the new type for consideration by the
            appropriate authority.
          example: EDAM:data_1187
          type: string
        source:
          description: Source of the attribute, as a CURIE prefix.
          example: UniProtKB
          type: string
        names:
          description: Human-readable names or labels for the attribute for attributes
            of  given type.
          example:
          - PubMed Identifier
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
      required:
      - attribute_type_id
      type: object
    transformer_query:
      properties:
        collection:
          description: List of elements that will be transformed. Required for all
            transformers except producers.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/element'
          type: array
        controls:
          description: Values that control the behavior of the transformer. Names
            of the controls must match the names specified in the transformer's definition
            and values must match types (and possibly  allowed_values) specified in
            the transformer's definition.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/property'
          type: array
      required:
      - controls
      type: object
    property:
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        value:
          type: string
      required:
      - name
      - value
      type: object
    element:
      example:
        biolink_class: biolink_class
        identifiers:
          key: '{}'
        provided_by: provided_by
        attributes:
        - value_url: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32529952
          attribute_source: UniProtKB
          value_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
          description: Assertion Authored By Dr. Trans L. Ator
          provided_by: provided_by
          attribute_type_id: Biolink:has_p-value_evidence, Biolink:has_original_source
          attributes:
          - null
          - null
          original_attribute_name: p-value
          value: 0.000153
        - value_url: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32529952
          attribute_source: UniProtKB
          value_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
          description: Assertion Authored By Dr. Trans L. Ator
          provided_by: provided_by
          attribute_type_id: Biolink:has_p-value_evidence, Biolink:has_original_source
          attributes:
          - null
          - null
          original_attribute_name: p-value
          value: 0.000153
        id: id
        source: source
        names_synonyms:
        - name_type: name_type
          synonyms:
          - synonyms
          - synonyms
          name: name
          provided_by: provided_by
          language: language
          source: source
        - name_type: name_type
          synonyms:
          - synonyms
          - synonyms
          name: name
          provided_by: provided_by
          language: language
          source: source
        connections:
        - inverse_relation: inverse_relation
          provided_by: provided_by
          biolink_predicate: biolink_predicate
          attributes:
          - value_url: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32529952
            attribute_source: UniProtKB
            value_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            description: Assertion Authored By Dr. Trans L. Ator
            provided_by: provided_by
            attribute_type_id: Biolink:has_p-value_evidence, Biolink:has_original_source
            attributes:
            - null
            - null
            original_attribute_name: p-value
            value: 0.000153
          - value_url: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32529952
            attribute_source: UniProtKB
            value_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            description: Assertion Authored By Dr. Trans L. Ator
            provided_by: provided_by
            attribute_type_id: Biolink:has_p-value_evidence, Biolink:has_original_source
            attributes:
            - null
            - null
            original_attribute_name: p-value
            value: 0.000153
          source: source
          inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
          source_element_id: source_element_id
          relation: relation
        - inverse_relation: inverse_relation
          provided_by: provided_by
          biolink_predicate: biolink_predicate
          attributes:
          - value_url: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32529952
            attribute_source: UniProtKB
            value_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            description: Assertion Authored By Dr. Trans L. Ator
            provided_by: provided_by
            attribute_type_id: Biolink:has_p-value_evidence, Biolink:has_original_source
            attributes:
            - null
            - null
            original_attribute_name: p-value
            value: 0.000153
          - value_url: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32529952
            attribute_source: UniProtKB
            value_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
            description: Assertion Authored By Dr. Trans L. Ator
            provided_by: provided_by
            attribute_type_id: Biolink:has_p-value_evidence, Biolink:has_original_source
            attributes:
            - null
            - null
            original_attribute_name: p-value
            value: 0.000153
          source: source
          inverse_predicate: inverse_predicate
          source_element_id: source_element_id
          relation: relation
        alternative_identifiers:
        - key: '{}'
        - key: '{}'
      properties:
        id:
          description: Primary identifier of the element.
          type: string
        biolink_class:
          description: BioLink class of the element.
          type: string
        identifiers:
          additionalProperties: true
          description: identifiers of the element.
          type: object
        alternative_identifiers:
          description: identifiers of additional chemical structures associated with
            chemical substance.
          items:
            additionalProperties: true
            type: object
          type: array
        names_synonyms:
          description: Names and synonyms of the element.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/names'
          type: array
        attributes:
          description: Additional information about the element and provenance about
            collection membership.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/attribute'
          type: array
        connections:
          description: connections to elements of the input collection.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/connection'
          type: array
        source:
          description: Source of the element
          type: string
        provided_by:
          description: Name of a transformer that added the element to the collection.
          type: string
      required:
      - biolink_class
      - id
      - identifiers
      - provided_by
      - source
      type: object
    attribute:
      description: Generic attribute for a node or an edge that expands the key-value
        pair concept by including fields for additional metadata. These fields can
        be used to describe the source of the statement made in key-value pair of
        the attribute object, or describe the attribute's value itself including its
        semantic type, or a url providing additional information about it.
      example:
        value_url: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32529952
        attribute_source: UniProtKB
        value_type_id: EDAM:data_1187
        description: Assertion Authored By Dr. Trans L. Ator
        provided_by: provided_by
        attribute_type_id: Biolink:has_p-value_evidence, Biolink:has_original_source
        attributes:
        - null
        - null
        original_attribute_name: p-value
        value: 0.000153
      properties:
        attribute_type_id:
          description: The 'key' of the attribute object, holding a CURIE of an ontology
            property defining the attribute (preferably the CURIE of a Biolink association
            slot). This property captures the relationship asserted to hold between
            the value of the attribute, and the node or edge from  which it hangs.
            For example, that a value of '0.000153' represents a p-value supporting
            an edge, or that a value of 'ChEMBL' represents the original source of
            the knowledge expressed in the edge.
          example: Biolink:has_p-value_evidence, Biolink:has_original_source
          type: string
        original_attribute_name:
          description: The term used by the original source of an attribute to describe
            the meaning or significance of the value it captures. This may be a column
            name in a source tsv file, or a key in a source json document for the
            field in the data that held the attribute's value. Capturing this information  where
            possible lets us preserve what the original source said. Note that the
            data type is string' but the contents of the field could also be a CURIE
            of a third party ontology term.
          example: p-value
          nullable: true
          type: string
        value:
          description: Value of the attribute. May be any data type, including a list.
          example: 0.000153
        value_type_id:
          description: CURIE describing the semantic type of an  attribute's value.
            Use a Biolink class if possible, otherwise a term from an external ontology.
            If a suitable CURIE/identifier does not exist, enter a descriptive phrase
            here and submit the new type for consideration by the appropriate authority.
          example: EDAM:data_1187
          type: string
        attribute_source:
          description: The source of the core assertion made by the key-value pair
            of an attribute object. Use a CURIE or namespace designator for this resource
            where possible.
          example: UniProtKB
          nullable: true
          type: string
        value_url:
          description: Human-consumable URL linking to a web document that provides
            additional information about an  attribute's value (not the node or the
            edge fom which it hangs).
          example: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32529952
          nullable: true
          type: string
        description:
          description: Human-readable description for the attribute and its value.
          example: Assertion Authored By Dr. Trans L. Ator
          nullable: true
          type: string
        attributes:
          description: 'A list of attributes providing further information about the
            parent attribute. '
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/attribute'
          type: array
        provided_by:
          description: Transformer that produced the attribute's value.
          type: string
      required:
      - attribute_source
      - attribute_type_id
      - original_attribute_name
      - value
      type: object
    names:
      example:
        name_type: name_type
        synonyms:
        - synonyms
        - synonyms
        name: name
